name: Terra Incognita -A retro inspired RPG - deluxe edition!
blurb: Terra Fiends and BearKin, two add ons for the RPG Terra Incognita.\nTerra Fiends is also a real life table top card game!

rewards.reward: For a pledge of \u00a31 you will receive my sincere thanks and your name or nickname(if you would prefer) on the 'Thank you' page on the official Terra website.
Add on pack!\r\nA pledge of \u00a34 or above will get you the add ons.\r\nThis is for those of you that already backed Terra Incognita and are not interested in a physical copy of Terra Fiends

Terra Incognita/Digital pack\r\nFor a pledge of \u00a310 you will receive the digital pack. \r\nThis includes Terra Incognita, full PC game, due to be released in December 2013. You will also get a full set of digital card designs and a digital lore book. All pledges of \u00a310 and above contain Terra Incognita PC game with the Terra Fiends and BearKin Add ons.

Early bird pack!
For £15 you will receive the Early bird pack! 
This contains the starter deck with £1 delivery.
Limited number available.
All pledges of £10 and above contain Terra Incognita PC game with the Terra Fiends and BearKin Add ons.
For a pledge of \u00a320 you will receive the Starter Deck pack. This includes the initial Terra Fiends Starter Deck. Deck contents are over to the left. Postage outside of the UK is \u00a33

Booster Pack ~ For a pledge of \u00a332 you will receive the Booster pack! This includes the initial Terra Fiends Starter Deck. You will also receive an additional booster deck of your choice. Deck contents are over to the left. Postage is included in the pledge amount.

Double Booster pack ~ For a pledge of \u00a345 you will receive the Double booster pack! This includes the initial Terra Fiends Starter Deck. You will also receive the two booster decks available at release and a special one off promo card for pledging \u00a345 or above. Deck contents are over to the left. Postage is included in the pledge amount.

Deluxe pack! 
For a pledge of £50 you will get the Double Booster pack and a boxed copy of Terra Incognita PC game. 
What a super Dooper bargain!
Postage is included in the pledge amount.

T shirt pack ~ For a pledge of \u00a365 you will receive the T shirt pack! This includes the initial Terra Fiends Starter Deck. You will also receive the two booster decks available at release, some cool Terra vinyl stickers and a Terra Fiends T shirt in small, medium or large. You also get a special one off promo card for pledging \u00a345 or above. Deck contents are over to the left. Postage is included in the pledge amount.

Build a bear!
Build a custom bear outfit/costume or provide us with details of your design ideas.
You will be able to get the costume in game.
You will also receive everything in the T shirt pack!
Custom Hatz\r\nFor a pledge of \u00a375 you get everything in the T shirt pack. But you can also create a custom hat for Bearkin!  You can either design it yourself or provide a design plan/idea.

Terra Fiends Master pack! ~ For a pledge of \u00a3100 you will receive the Terra Fiends Master pack! This includes the initial Terra Fiends Starter Deck. You will also receive the two booster decks available at release and a Terra Fiends T shirt in small, medium or large. You also get a Terra Fiends Lore Art book, this contains awesome back story on the world of Terra as well as some really great artwork. A special one off promo card for pledging \u00a345 or above, some vinyl stickers. Deck contents are over to the left. Postage is included in the pledge amount.
